entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
